flavorText: Its teeth exist only for decoration.

foreignData.name: Verschlingender Brammenwurm
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Verschlingende Brammenwurm eine Kreatur blockt oder von einer Kreatur geblockt wird, zerstöre diese Kreatur. Du erhältst Lebenspunkte in Höhe der Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur dazu.

foreignData.name: Sierpescoria engullidora
foreignData.text: Siempre que la Sierpescoria engullidora bloquee o sea bloqueada por una criatura, destruye esa criatura. Ganas vidas igual a la resistencia de esa criatura.

foreignData.name: Guivre cendrée phagocyteuse
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que la Guivre cendrée phagocyteuse bloque ou devient bloquée par une créature, détruisez cette créature. Vous gagnez un nombre de points de vie égal à l'endurance de cette créature.

foreignData.flavorText: I suoi denti servono solo come ornamento.
foreignData.name: Wurm delle Scorie Travolgente
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta il Wurm delle Scorie Travolgente blocca o viene bloccato da una creatura, distruggi quella creatura. Guadagni punti vita pari alla costituzione di quella creatura.

foreignData.flavorText: その歯はただの飾りだ。
foreignData.name: 飲み込む金屑ワーム
foreignData.text: 飲み込む金屑ワームがクリーチャー１体をブロックするかクリーチャー１体にブロックされた状態になるたび、そのクリーチャーを破壊する。 あなたはそのクリーチャーのタフネスに等しい点数のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ワーム

foreignData.flavorText: Seus dentes têm efeito meramente decorativo.
foreignData.name: Vorme Escoriáceo Engolidor
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Vorme Escoriáceo Engolidor bloquear ou for bloqueado por uma criatura, destrua aquela criatura. Você ganha uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual à resistência daquela criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Его зубы служат исключительно для украшения.
foreignData.name: Шлаковый Вурм-Поглотитель
foreignData.text: Каждый раз когда Шлаковый Вурм-Поглотитель блокирует или становится заблокирован существом, уничтожьте то существо. Вы получаете количество жизней, равное выносливости того существа.

foreignData.name: 吞食熔滓亚龙
foreignData.text: 每当吞食熔滓亚龙阻挡生物或被生物阻挡时，消灭该生物。 你获得等同于该生物防御力的生命。

foreignData.name: 吞食熔滓亞龍
foreignData.text: 每當吞食熔滓亞龍阻擋生物或被生物阻擋時，消滅該生物。 你獲得等同於該生物防禦力的生命。

name: Engulfing Slagwurm
originalText: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

rulings.text: Engulfing Slagwurm’s ability triggers and resolves during the declare blockers step. Creatures destroyed this way will not deal combat damage.

If your Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by multiple creatures, its ability triggers that many times. Each trigger will be associated with a specific creature. You choose which order to have the abilities resolve.

If Engulfing Slagwurm’s ability resolves and the other creature is not destroyed (perhaps because it has already left the battlefield or it regenerates), you’ll still gain life equal to that creature’s toughness.

As each ability resolves, the amount of life you gain is equal to the appropriate creature’s current toughness (if it’s somehow still on the battlefield), or its toughness as it last existed on the battlefield (in all other cases).

Even if the ability of an attacking Engulfing Slagwurm destroys each creature blocking it, Engulfing Slagwurm won’t deal combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking unless it somehow gains trample.

text: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
